RankDef.description: A candidate for induction into the High Ordinators, undergoing rigorous trials and training.
An elite guardian of the highest order, combining exceptional combat skills with unwavering devotion to the Tribunal.
A commander of High Ordinators, possessing legendary skill and the authority to lead the Temple's finest warriors.
A supreme leader among the High Ordinators, commanding multiple companies of elite temple guards.
The supreme commander of all High Ordinators, second only to the Hands of Almalexia in martial authority.
